Carol Ann Smith
&
Christopher Lamb

Request the pleasure of your company at the celebration of their marriage on Sunday the fifth of May Two Thousand and Twenty Four at two o' clock in the afternoon

St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel
London, England, NW1 2AR

Reception

A ceremony will be followed by a cocktail reception, dinner and further celebrations. Dinner will be a three course meal with a choice of starter and main course. Regrettably we are unable to accommodate children.

Accommodation

Guest accommodations are available for you to book at the St. Pancras Renaissance Hotel, Euston Road, London, NW1 2AR.

Please use the code 'ZS7' on Marriott.com in the corporate/promo code section of the website when you check availability to access a discounted rate.

Registry

Information will be sent closer to our wedding date for those who would like to get us something from our registry.

Dress

Black tie attire.

Tuxedos and floor-length gowns.

If you feel inspired, art nouveau, gilded age, late Victorian, or Edwardian fashion accents are encouraged as part of your attire.
